column4: Would it be possible for me to revert back to the e1000e (100?) version driver for my NIC that was in Hardy?
I can't get my NIC to work in anything higher than Hardy
it's possible, you have to do it in repositories
It's an Intel 82562V-2
not sure.. USB wifi card to update your system and set repositories back to older driver?
i'm not made out of money lol
got a friend with one?
who needs that
I'm outta ideas then
why did it screw up Hardy -> Intrepid, and Jaunty too in the first place?
it worked perfect in Hardy
now it makes the router flash and twinkle around
no idea, sorry
and never connects
I guess I "could" get a new NIC
you may just need an update :p
well how ... am I gonna get it? lol
carefully :p
got an external enclosure for your HDD?
http://hardware4linux.info/component/34798/
I haven't looked at it yet
ok, it shows that e1000, and e1000e is "supposed" to make it work in 8.04 (and it does)
